DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: Ford Exports to Mexico Rev Up : The auto_maker said it plans to export about 25 # 000 U.S.-made cars and trucks to Mexico this year.Ford Motor Co . Chairman Alex Trotman told shareholders at the company ' s annual meeting in Cleveland that its Lorain , Ohio , plant has started making the first of about 3 # 400 Ford Thunderbirds and Mercury Cougars earmarked for the Mexican market . Ford ' s U.S. exports to Mexico in 1993 , before the North_American Free_Trade Agreement , totaled 1 # 764 vehicles .
